home.title: Marie Mwape Kashimbo
home.subtitle: Driven by Compassion, Committed to Change
home.heroText: Congolese philanthropist, founder of the FMMPS Foundation, and emerging political figure dedicated to transforming lives in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
home.missionText: To create lasting change through compassionate action, supporting the most vulnerable in our society while advocating for better governance and social justice.

about.title: About Marie Mwape Kashimbo
about.subtitle: A Life Dedicated to Service
about.biography: Marie Mwape Kashimbo is a prominent Congolese philanthropist and social activist who has dedicated her life to improving the conditions of the most vulnerable populations in the Democratic Republic of Congo. Through her unwavering commitment to social justice and human dignity, she has become a beacon of hope for thousands of people.
about.valuesText: Guided by principles of compassion, integrity, and social responsibility, Marie believes in the power of collective action to create meaningful change. Her work spans across multiple sectors including healthcare, education, and social welfare.
about.journeyText: From her early days as a community organizer to founding the FMMPS Foundation and entering the political arena, Marie's journey reflects her deep commitment to serving others and building a better future for all Congolese people.

foundation.title: FMMPS Foundation
foundation.subtitle: Transforming Lives Through Compassionate Action
foundation.overview: The FMMPS Foundation, founded by Marie Mwape Kashimbo, is dedicated to supporting the most vulnerable members of society including orphans, people with disabilities, albinos, and those facing mental health challenges.
foundation.impactText: Through direct intervention and community support programs, the Foundation has touched thousands of lives, providing essential services, healthcare, and hope to those who need it most.

political.title: Political Journey
political.subtitle: Advocating for Change Through Governance
political.nogecText: In July 2025, Marie Mwape Kashimbo joined NOGEC (National Organization for Good Governance and Change), marking her formal entry into the political arena to advocate for better governance and social policies.
political.advocacyText: Her political platform focuses on social welfare, healthcare reform, education access, and creating policies that protect the most vulnerable populations in Congolese society.
political.goalsText: Working towards comprehensive social reform, improved healthcare systems, and governance structures that prioritize human dignity and social justice.

media.title: Media & News
media.subtitle: Coverage and Recognition
media.recognitionText: Marie's work has been recognized through various awards and media coverage, highlighting her significant contributions to Congolese society.
